history.proof: unfold sup. sfirstorder depth: 3use: sup_closed, supM.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) x : A Unable to unify "simpl_fun (Pred ?T) Prop" with "Lattice.mx_sup (Lattice.mixin (Lattice.class (funLattice A B))) s x = Lattice.mx_sup (Lattice.mixin (Lattice.class B)) [Pred y | exists f : A -> B, f \\In s /\\ y = f x]".

original: unfold sup. apply sup_closed. intros d H. apply supM. intros y H'. exists (fun _ => y). split. - auto. - reflexivity.
